Name: Impostor Inside Us
About the game: A person impersonating a member of an underground research institute with the aim of destroying all members of the research team. You will choose between becoming a member of team or impostor. As a member, find and detect the fake with the clues provided by the members. As an impostor, find the opportunity and destroy all members to win. Peopel : Win by finding the impostor . Vote those with suspicious behavior to find out the impostor. Complete all quests to win. Murder : Kill another people to win game. Use destructive tricks to cause chaos and split the crew. Destroy the system to cause chaos to find opportunities to kill others. You will win when only have you and one person survive.
